original_text: Only the cattle we took for a prey unto ourselves, and the spoil of the cities which we took.
korean_text: 다만 그 가축과 성읍에서 탈취한 것은 우리의 소유로 삼았으며

sentences.original_text: Only the cattle we took for a prey unto ourselves
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 자신들을 위한 전리품으로 가져온 소들만

sentences.original_text: and the spoil of the cities which we took
